Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: Cindy Walzak
Reviews.Content: Hardly ever use my laptop since I received my I pad.  Love the convenience and being able to take it with me everywhere.  The speed is incredible.  One of the best things I have purchased

Reviews.Title: the seller was awesome and very patient!!!!
Reviews.Author: Gabe
Reviews.Content: this Ipad 2 16GB is just a joy, not sure if I could give it up, this is so versitile and useful as well as fun. great great product. well worth the money!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: unicorn0034
Reviews.Content: Bought this item for my cousin since someone stole his old one. He love it and is going to help him.

Reviews.Title: Christmas Present
Reviews.Author: Thomas Roosa
Reviews.Content: The iPad2 was a Christmas gift for my wife and has exceeded all expectations.  The Face Time application is great to talk with our daughter and son in-law that just moved to Texas.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Alvigno
Reviews.Content: Like new, it only had a few small scratches on the screen but everything else looks like new. Grade A iPad, I'm happy with this purchase :)
